# accessoryControllers

**Instance Property**

An array of accessory view controllers belonging to the page layout panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var accessoryControllers: [NSViewController] { get }
```

## Discussion

The `NSViewController` instances representing the accessory view controllers belonging to the receiver.

## Customizing the page setup dialog

- **addAccessoryController(_:)**: Adds the specified controller of an accessory view to be presented in the page setup panel.
- **removeAccessoryController(_:)**: Removes the specified controller of an accessory view.
